https://tmrev.io/movie/676448-Barenboim on Beethoven - The Complete Piano Sonatas Live from Berlin 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/676448-Barenboim on Beethoven - The Complete Piano Sonatas Live from Berlin 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8I4saBtP7AXzqTdYsKG487oGJ0X.jpg In 2005, legendary pianist Daniel Barenboim performed the complete Beethoven piano sonatas over 8 concerts in 2 weeks at the Staatsoper in Berlin. These definitive performances were lavishly filmed and beautifully produced, and are now presented here in a.32 sonatas recorded during a series of eight concerts which took place in the summer of 2005 at the Berlin State Opera House. Included is a comprehensive booklet with notes on all 32 sonatas and interactive Beethoven and piano timelines Barenboim on Beethoven - The Complete Piano Sonatas Live from Berlin
